description: Trap information about ARP speed limit: interface index, current configured limit number, current received number, limit type (ARP, ARP-MISS), source IP address, destination IP address, VPN instance.

event.Summary: ARP speed limit exceeded configured threshold of $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPSpeedLimitAlarm HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPSpeedLimitIfIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPSpeedLimitConfigured c 9999 HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPSpeedLimitCurrent c 9999 HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPSpeedLimitType s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPSpeedLimitSrcIPAddr a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPSpeedLimitDstIPAddr a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPSpeedLimitVPNinstance s EXAMPLE

description: Indicates an interface enabled with ARP-MISS
or an interface receiving the ARP packets.

description: The Configured Speed Limit Value of ARP Speed Limit.

description: The Destination IP address of ARP Speed Limit.

description: The VPN-instance name of ARP Speed Limit.

description: Trap information about ARP anti-attack: IP address, MAC, VLAN id, interface index.

description: Trap information about ARP anti-attack: IP address, MAC, VLAN ID, interface index.

description: Trap information about ARP exceed threshold: slot, threshold, number of dynamic ARP, number of static ARP.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPThresholdExceedAlarm ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPThresholdValue c 9999 HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPThresholdDynamicNumber c 9999 HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPThresholdStaticNumber c 9999

description: The textual name of the physical entity. The value of this
object should be the name of the component as assigned by
the local device and should be suitable for use in commands
entered at the device's `console'. This might be a text
name (e.g., `console') or a simple component number (e.g.
port or module number, such as `1'), depending on the
physical component naming syntax of the device.
If there is no local name, or if this object is otherwise
not applicable, then this object contains a zero-length
string.
Note that the value of entPhysicalName for two physical
entities will be the same in the event that the console
interface does not distinguish between them, e.g., slot-1
and the card in slot-1.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalName

description: This object indicates the threshold of the alarm generated.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPThresholdValue

description: This object indicates the number of dynamic ARP entries.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPThresholdDynamicNumber

description: This object indicates the number of static ARP entries.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ETHARP-MIB::hwEthernetARPThresholdStaticNumber

description: Trap information about ARP resume threshold: slot, threshold, number of dynamic ARP, number of static ARP.
